articles.author: Abha Bhattarai
articles.title: Food, gas and cars could quickly get pricier under Trump’s tariff plan - The Washington Post
articles.description: Americans are finally starting to get relief from inflation, but that reprieve may be short-lived if imports from Mexico and Canada come under fire.
articles.content:
A new wave of tariffs could quickly reignite inflation on food, gas and automobiles, just as Americans were finally starting to catch a break from fast-rising prices.
